subject: Mixed Martial Arts
Tests (Drug Use)
Testosterone
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The fighter Alistair Overeem failed a drug test in Nevada, putting plans for his scheduled U.F.C. heavyweight championship matchup in jeopardy.
snippet: The fighter Alistair Overeem failed a drug test in Nevada, putting plans for his scheduled U.F.C. heavyweight championship matchup in jeopardy.
